content: सारस्वत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सरस्वती देवतास्य, सरस्वत्या इदं वा अण्] {@--1@} Relating to the goddess Sarasvatī. {@--2@} Belonging to the river Sarasvatī; कृत्वा तासामभिगममपां सौम्य सारस्वतीनां <ls>Me. 49.</ls> {@--3@} Eloquent. {@--4@} Belonging to the Sārasvata country. --तः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country about the river Sarasvatī. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a particular class of Brāhmaṇas. {@--3@} A particular ceremonial used in the worship of Sarasvatī. {@--4@} A staff of the Bilva tree. --ताः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) The people of the Sārasvata country. --तं Speech, eloquence; शृंगारसारस्वतं <ls>Gīt. 12.</ls>
